cleaned_text: Natural Crystal Deodorant Regular price £4.50 Regular priceUnit price per £5.99 Sale price £4.50 - 100% natural - Naturally fabulous citrus fragrance - Free from irritants, parabens and SLSs - Non sticky, easy to use & compact - No aluminium chlorohydrate - A travel essential - Registered with the Vegan Society Long-lasting and non-sticky with a fresh, citrus fragrance, incognito®'s Deodorant is the first alum crystal to be infused with an essential oil. Reduces attractiveness to mosquitoes. For complete protection anywhere in the world, use in conjunction with incognito®'s Spray, Suncream, Lotion or Roll On. Suitable for all the family over 2 years upwards. Finally, there is no GM, and we never test
